    Method
    Description
    static int
    calculateErraticGrowthRate(int n)
    Cased cubic equation for calculating the experience required to reach a level of n

    \(EXP = \begin{cases} \frac{n^3\left(100 - n\right)}{50} & n < 50 \\ \frac{n^3\left(150 - n\right)}{100} & 50 \le n < 68 \\ \frac{n^3\lfloor\frac{1911-10n}{3}\rfloor}{500} & 68 \le n < 98 \\ \frac{n^3\left(160 - n\right)}{100} & 98 \le n < 100 \end{cases}\)
    static int

    \(\Delta EXP = \frac{b \times L}{7} \times \frac{1}{s} \times e \times a \times t\)
    static int

    Description

    \(\Delta EXP = \left( \frac{b \times L}{5} \times a \times \frac{1}{s} \times \left( \frac{\lfloor \sqrt{2L + 10} \times \left(2L + 10\right)^2 \rfloor}{\lfloor \sqrt{L \times L_{p} + 10} \times \left(L + L_{p} + 10\right)^2 \rfloor} \right) + 1 \right) \times t \times e \times p\)

  • Method Details

    • calculateExperienceGainGeneration1To4

      public static int calculateExperienceGainGeneration1To4(int b, int l, int s, float e, float a, float t)
      Description

      \(\Delta EXP = \frac{b \times L}{7} \times \frac{1}{s} \times e \times a \times t\)
      Parameters:
      b - int value of the base experience of the defeated Pokémon
      l - int value of the level of the defeated Pokémon
      s - if EXP. All is not in the player's bag int value of the number of Pokémon participated in the battle and have not fainted otherwise ToDo: this
      e - float value of 1.5 if the winning Pokémon is holding a Lucky Egg. float value of 1.0 otherwise.
      a - float value of 1.0 if the defeated Pokémon is wild. float value of 1.5 if the defeated Pokémon is owned.
      t - float value of 1.0 if the current player is the original owner of the Pokémon. float value of 1.5 otherwise. (i.e. the Pokémon has been traded)

    • calculateExperienceGainGeneration5

      public static int calculateExperienceGainGeneration5(int b, int l, int lp, float a, int s, float t, float e, float p)
      Description

      \(\Delta EXP = \left( \frac{b \times L}{5} \times a \times \frac{1}{s} \times \left( \frac{\lfloor \sqrt{2L + 10} \times \left(2L + 10\right)^2 \rfloor}{\lfloor \sqrt{L \times L_{p} + 10} \times \left(L + L_{p} + 10\right)^2 \rfloor} \right) + 1 \right) \times t \times e \times p\)
      Parameters:
      b - int value of the base experience of the defeated Pokémon
      l - int value of the level of the defeated Pokémon
      lp - int value of the level of the victorious Pokémon
      a - float value of 1.0 if the defeated Pokémon is wild. float value of 1.5 if the defeated Pokémon is owned.
      s - ToDo: this
      t - float value of 1.0 if the current player is the original owner of the Pokémon. float value of 1.5 otherwise. (i.e. the Pokémon has been traded) float value of 6963/4096 if the Pokémon has a different language of origin.
      e - float value of 1.5 if the winning Pokémon is holding a Lucky Egg. float value of 1.0 otherwise.
      p - float value of 1.0 if

    • calculateExperienceGainGeneration6

      public static int calculateExperienceGainGeneration6(int b, int l, int s, float a, float t, float e, float v, float f, float p)
      Description

      \(\Delta EXP = \frac{b \times L}{7} \times a \times \frac{1}{s} \times t \times e \times v \times f \times p\)
      Parameters:
      b - int value of the base experience of the defeated Pokémon
      l - int value of the level of the defeated Pokémon
      s - ToDo: this
      a - float value of 1.0 if the defeated Pokémon is wild. float value of 1.5 if the defeated Pokémon is owned.
      t - float value of 1.0 if the current player is the original owner of the Pokémon. float value of 1.5 otherwise. (i.e. the Pokémon has been traded) float value of 1.7 if the Pokémon has a different language of origin.
      e - float value of 1.5 if the winning Pokémon is holding a Lucky Egg. float value of 1.0 otherwise.
      v - float value of 4915/4096 (~1.2) if the victorious Pokémon is above its evolving level. float value of 1.0 otherwise.
      f - ToDo: this
      p - ToDo: this

    • calculateExperienceGainGeneration7Onward

      public static int calculateExperienceGainGeneration7Onward(int b, int l, int lp, int s, float t, float e, float v, float f, float p)
      Description

      \(\Delta EXP = \left(\frac{b \times L}{5} \times \frac{1}{s} \times \left(\frac{2L+10}{L+L_{p}+10}\right)^{2.5} + 1 \right) \times t \times e \times v \times f \times p\)
      Parameters:
      b - int value of the base experience of the defeated Pokémon
      l - int value of the level of the defeated Pokémon
      lp - int value of the level of the victorious Pokémon
      s - ToDo: this
      t - float value of 1.0 if the current player is the original owner of the Pokémon. float value of 1.5 otherwise. (i.e. the Pokémon has been traded) float value of 1.7 if the Pokémon has a different language of origin.
      e - float value of 1.5 if the winning Pokémon is holding a Lucky Egg. float value of 1.0 otherwise.
      v - float value of 4915/4096 (~1.2) if the victorious Pokémon is above its evolving level. float value of 1.0 otherwise.
      f - ToDo: this
      p - ToDo: this

    • calculateFastGrowthRate

      public static int calculateFastGrowthRate(int n)
      Cubic equation for calculating the experience required to reach a level of n

      \(EXP = \frac{4n^3}{5}\)
      Parameters:
      n - int value of the level
      Returns:
      return the total exp value required to reach level of n

    • calculateFluctuatingGrowthRate

      public static int calculateFluctuatingGrowthRate(int n)
      Cased cubic equation for calculating the experience required to reach a level of n

      \(EXP = \begin{cases} \frac{n^3 \left( \lfloor\frac{n + 1}{3}\rfloor + 24\right)}{50} & n < 15 \\ \frac{n^3\left(n + 14\right)}{50} & 15 \le n < 36 \\ \frac{n^3\left(\lfloor\frac{n}{2}\rfloor + 32 \right)}{50} & 36 \le n < 100 \end{cases}\)
      Parameters:
      n - int value of the level
      Returns:
      int value of the experience required to reach the level n

    • calculateErraticGrowthRate

      public static int calculateErraticGrowthRate(int n)
      Cased cubic equation for calculating the experience required to reach a level of n

      \(EXP = \begin{cases} \frac{n^3\left(100 - n\right)}{50} & n < 50 \\ \frac{n^3\left(150 - n\right)}{100} & 50 \le n < 68 \\ \frac{n^3\lfloor\frac{1911-10n}{3}\rfloor}{500} & 68 \le n < 98 \\ \frac{n^3\left(160 - n\right)}{100} & 98 \le n < 100 \end{cases}\)
      Parameters:
      n - int value of the level
      Returns:
      int value of the experience required to reach the level n
